summary.span: 表示 5 元组，或五元组。

span.span: Represents a 5-tuple, or quintuple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示5元组，即五元组，它是具有五个组件的元组。The class represents a 5-tuple, or quintuple, which is a tuple that has five components. 可以 通过调用 构造函数或静态方法来实例化对象 。You can instantiate a object by calling either the constructor or the static method. 您可以通过使用 "只读"、"、" 和 "实例" 属性来检索元组组件的值 。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , , , and instance properties. 元组通常以四种不同的方式使用：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 表示单个数据集。To represent a single set of data. 例如，元组可以表示数据库记录，并且其组件可以表示记录的各个字段。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 提供对数据集的轻松访问和操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下面的示例定义了一个对象的数组，这些 对象包含在美国橄榄球运行的支持的名称、在其中播放的游戏的数量，以及在这些游戏期间获得的每个游戏的总数和多。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of running backs in American football, the number of games in which they played, and the number of carries, total yards gained, and touchdowns scored during those games. 将数组传递给 `ComputeStatistics` 方法，该方法计算每个游戏的每个正在运行的执行数、每个游戏的平均码、每个每个请求的平均码以及每次尝试的平均多数。The array is passed to the `ComputeStatistics` method, which calculates each running back's number of carries per game, average yards per game, average yards per carry, and average number of touchdowns per attempt. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`5.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`5.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 如果为，则从方法返回多个值，而不使用 `out` 参数 (在 c # 中 ) 或 `ByRef` (Visual Basic) 中的参数。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如，上一个示例在对象数组中返回其计算统计信息以及播放机的名称 。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the name of the player, in an array of objects. - 若要通过单个参数向方法传递多个值，则为。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，该 方法只有一个参数，该参数使你可以为启动时线程执行的方法提供一个值。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果提供 对象作为方法自变量，则可以提供线程的启动例程，其中包含五个数据项。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread's startup routine with five items of data.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以使用静态 方法来实例化5元组对象，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。You can also use the static method to instantiate a 5-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下面的示例使用 方法来实例化5元组，该元组的第一个组件为类型 ，其余四个组件的类型为 。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 5-tuple whose first component is of type and its remaining four components are of type . [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#9)] 这等效于对 类构造函数的以下调用。This is equivalent to the following call to the class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`在下列条件下，参数被视为等于当前实例：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是一个 对象。It is a object. - 它的五个组件的类型与当前实例相同。Its five components are of the same types as the current instance. - 它的五个组件等于当前实例的组件。Its five components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认对象相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了5元组对象的数组，这些对象包含两个测试组中患者的温度数据。The following example defines an array of 5-tuple objects that contain data about the temperatures of patients in two test groups. 该数组的第一个组件提供测试组的数量，第二到第五个组件提供患者的温度（按小时为间隔）。The first component of the array provides the number of the test group, and the second through fifth components provide the temperatures of a patient at hourly intervals. 调用方法以将每个 对象与每个其他 对象进行比较。The method is called to compare every object with every other object. 该输出说明了 方法 `true` 仅在对象的所有五个组件 都具有相等值时才返回。The output illustrates that the method returns `true` only when all five components of the objects have equal values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`5.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`5.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过 `GetType` 对属性返回的值调用方法 。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象 ，并从该数组中检索由其方法返回的第一个元素 。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个对象数组，这些 对象的组件包含美国中状态的名称、其在1990和2000中的人口、此10年期内的人口变动以及其总体中的百分比变化。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain the name of a state in the United States, its population in 1990 and 2000, its population change in this 10-year period, and the percentage change in its population. 然后，它循环访问数组并显示元组中每个组件的值。It then iterates through the array and displays the value of each component in a tuple. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`5.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`5.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过 `GetType` 对属性返回的值调用方法 。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象 ，并从其方法返回的数组中检索第二个元素 。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the second element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个对象数组，这些 对象的组件包含美国中状态的名称、其在1990和2000中的人口、此10年期内的人口变动以及其总体中的百分比变化。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain the name of a state in the United States, its population in 1990 and 2000, its population change in this 10-year period, and the percentage change in its population. 然后，它循环访问数组并显示元组中每个组件的值。It then iterates through the array and displays the value of each component in a tuple. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过 `GetType` 对属性返回的值调用方法 。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象 ，并从其方法返回的数组中检索第二个元素 。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the second element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个 对象数组，这些对象的组件包含在美国的州的名称、其在1990和2000中的人口、此10年内的人口变动以及其人口的百分比变化。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain the name of a state in the United Dates, its population in 1990 and 2000, its population change in this 10-year period, and the percentage change in its population. 然后，它循环访问数组并显示元组中每个组件的值。It then iterates through the array and displays the value of each component in a tuple. MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

abstract member System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo : obj * System.Collections.IComparer -> int override this.System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo : obj * System.Collections.IComparer -> int

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供用于比较的自定义规则的对象。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.
Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance precedes .
Zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。

span.span: This instance and have the same position in the sort order.
A positive integer
This instance follows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 尽管可以直接调用此方法，但它最常由包含参数的集合排序方法调用， 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，它由 方法和 使用构造函数实例化的对象的方法调用 。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等，则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用 方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 包含职业统计数据的对象数组，这些数据用于在美国职业橄榄球中运行。The following example creates an array of objects that contain career statistical data for running backs in American professional football. 5元组的组件包含播放机的名称、在其中播放的游戏数、执行或尝试的次数、所获得的码总数以及评分的多数量。The 5-tuple's components consist of the player's name, the number of games in which he played, the number of carries or attempts, the total number of yards gained, and the number of touchdowns scored. 该示例以未排序的顺序显示数组中每个元组的组件，对数组进行排序，然后调用 以按排序顺序显示每个元组。The example displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display each tuple in sorted order. 为了对数组进行排序，此示例定义了一个泛型 `YardsGained` 类，该类实现 接口，并 按其第四个分量的值以降序对对象进行排序，而不是按其第一个组件 () 码。To sort the array, the example defines a generic `YardsGained` class that implements the interface and sorts the objects in descending order by the value of their fourth component (yards gained) rather than by their first component. 请注意，该示例不会直接调用 方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 此方法由 方法为数组中的每个元素隐式调用。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`5.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`5.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`5.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

abstract member System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals : obj * System.Collections.IEqualityComparer -> bool override this.System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals : obj * System.Collections.IEqualityComparer -> bool

param.name: other
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，该对象定义用于评估两个对象是否相等的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当不为时，才会调用实现 `other` `null` ，并且如果可以成功地强制转换 c # 中的 () 或将) Visual Basic 中的 (转换为 其组件与当前实例相同的类型的对象。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法首先传递 要与实现进行比较的对象的值 。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回 `true` ，将再次调用方法并传递 两个对象的值 。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 此过程将继续，直到方法调用 `false` 在比较特定对值时返回 `Item` ，或将两个 值传递给方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of `Item` values, or the two values are passed to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个实现 `DoubleComparer` 接口的 类。The following example defines a `DoubleComparer` class that implements the interface. 该示例 使用随机数生成器来实例化两个对象，将第二个对象填充到第五个组件，将第一个实例转换为 接口，然后使用 `DoubleComparer` 对象测试两个 对象是否大致相等。The example instantiates two objects by using a random number generator to populate their second through fifth components, casts the first instance to an interface, and then uses a `DoubleComparer` object to test the two objects for approximate equality. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只是包装对 `comparer` 对象实现的调用 。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应为被视为相等的两个对象返回相同的哈希代码 。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供 类的实现 。This method provides the implementation for the class. 尽管可以直接调用方法，但它通常由集合排序方法（如和）的默认重载调用， 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection-sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等，则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用 方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法使用默认的对象比较器来比较每个组件。The method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个对象数组 ，其中包含在美国职业橄榄球运行的职业统计信息。The following example creates an array of objects that contain career statistics for running backs in American professional football. 这五个组件包含播放机的名称、玩游戏的游戏数、携带或尝试次数、所获得的码总数以及评分的多数。The five components consist of the player's name, the number of games in which he played, the number of carries or attempts, the total number of yards gained, and the number of touchdowns scored. 该示例以未排序的顺序显示数组中每个元组的组件，对数组进行排序，然后调用 以按排序顺序显示每个元组。The example displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display each tuple in sorted order. 输出显示数组已按名称排序，这是第一个组件。The output shows that the array has been sorted by name, which is the first component. 请注意，该示例不会直接调用 方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 此方法由 方法为数组中的每个元素隐式调用。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的字符串采用的 (形式为： *Item1*、 *Item2*、 *Item3*、 *tuple.item4*、 `Item5`) ，其中 *Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *tuple.item4*， `Item5` 分别表示、、、 和 属性的值。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, `Item5`), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, and `Item5` represent the values of the , , , , and properties, respectively. 如果任何属性值为，则将 `null` 其表示为 。If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法。The following example illustrates the method. 它显示5元组对象的数组，其中包含美国中状态的名称、其在1990和2000中的人口、此10年期内的人口变动以及人口变动率。It displays an array of 5-tuple objects that contain the name of a state in the United States, its population in 1990 and 2000, its population change in this 10-year period, and the annual rate of population change.
